definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Most of the time the data is dependent upon the middleware being used.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数情况下，数据依赖于所使用的中间件。

sentences.english: Our interest is in the process management and middleware infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 我们的兴趣在于过程管理和中间件基础设施。

sentences.english: And this is where middleware comes in.
sentences.chinese: 这正是中间件的用武之地。
什么是面向消息的中间件？

sentences.english: Message-oriented middleware relies heavily on a perimeter security model.
sentences.chinese: 面向消息的中间件非常依赖外围网络安全模型。

sentences.english: It encompasses the middleware infrastructure for hosting that implementation.
sentences.chinese: 它包含用于承载该实现的中间件基础设施。

sentences.english: But it would keep you on your current three-tier architecture with custom middle-ware.
sentences.chinese: 但它将保持你在您当前的三层架构与自定义中间件。

sentences.english: It reduces the amount of coding required to interface systems and middleware.
sentences.chinese: 它减少了定义系统和中间件的接口所需的编码量。

sentences.english: I believed it was the way forward for enterprise middleware.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这将是企业级中间件的光明大道。

sentences.english: The messaging middleware routes the message to the destination of the service provider.
sentences.chinese: 消息传递中间件将消息路由到服务提供者的目的地。

sentences.english: Based on the grid middleware used by scientific computing grid, the GRM was implemented.
sentences.chinese: 以科学计算网格的中间件为基础，实现了GRM。

sentences.english: Messaging services are analogs of the classic middleware concept.
sentences.chinese: 消息服务类似于一流的中间件原则。

sentences.english: Many SOA patterns are implemented in commercial and open source middleware.
sentences.chinese: 许多SOA模式都有商用和开源中间件的实现。

sentences.english: Grid middlewares eliminate of the isolated information islands on the network.
sentences.chinese: 网格中间件消除了因特网内的信息资源孤岛。

sentences.english: Accomplishment of middleware based on RTCC protocol.
sentences.chinese: 基于RTCC协议中间件的实现。

sentences.english: However, this tutorial focuses on the middleware tier.
sentences.chinese: 不过，本教程的重点是中间件层。
